message: I have some ideas for Leo about the new TWiT Studios... why not bring back Photoshop Tips like on Call For Help.... He could bring in Alex Lindsay via Skype or in studio and show off Photoshop Tips.  Example found here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UbN6Lvo8vq4&feature=feedu
I could see them easily add something like this to "Mostly Photo"
@superpc Why would Alex need to be on Skype for that - he's right next door, or upstairs.

I think that TWiT will have a lot of demos when the new studio is done. They just didn't have space before. I suggested to Leo that there be a Call for Help like program. Beginner become geeks who will watch the TWiT shows.
Do you think a show about vintage computers would be cool? C64, Atari, Sinclair, etc.
Yes I love anything vintage from cars to camera's anything vintage I LOVE it great idea
